Major_Arcs.title: King Guz and the Unpaid Debt
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces King Guz's near-drowning experience and Alley Oop's subsequent confrontation regarding an unpaid debt, revealing Alley's opportunistic nature.

sub_scenes.title: King Guz's 'Drowning' and Rescue
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is seemingly drowning and is rescued by Alley Oop.

sub_scenes.title: The Unpaid Debt Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Immediately after the rescue, Alley confronts King Guz about an old debt.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Trade-In
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Alley Oop's journey to trade in his old dinosaur Bronto Soreness for a newer model, encountering a dinosaur dealership and experiencing a test drive.

sub_scenes.title: Travel with Bronto Soreness and Tree Collision
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop travels with Bronto Soreness, who repeatedly bumps into trees, leading to a diagnosis of old age.

narrative_arcs.title: Bronto Soreness Collides with a Tree

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Trade-In Suggestion and Dealership Arrival
sub_scenes.description: Dinny considers trading in his dinosaur, and Alley Oop arrives at Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Test Drive Offer and Deal Confirmation
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop is offered a test drive, and a deal is discussed at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership
Arrival at Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership
Test Drive Offer at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Exciting and Treacherous Test Drive and Deal Concluded
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop takes a test drive, encounters a biting incident, but still concludes the deal.

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to the Old Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: The old dinosaur is saddened by being replaced, and Alley Oop says farewell.

narrative_arcs.title: Old Dinosaur Marked Down for Sale

sub_scenes.title: Instructions for New Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop gets instructions for his new dinosaur.

Major_Arcs.title: New Dinosaur Mishaps and Romantic Rejection
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's initial struggles with his new dinosaur, leading to comical mishaps and a romantic rejection from Ooola.

sub_scenes.title: Dealership Scene and Initial Ride Mishap
sub_scenes.description: Scenes at the dinosaur dealership and Alley Oop's first ride on the new dinosaur, which ends in a collision.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Salesman's Pitch and Dissatisfied Customer

sub_scenes.title: Fall and Dinny's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop falls off the new dinosaur and is scolded by Dinny.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Dinosaur Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny reacts angrily to perceived mistreatment of his dinosaur and charges towards cave children.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Breakup with Ooola
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop invites Ooola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to accusations and a breakup.

Major_Arcs.title: Misogynistic Views and Romantic Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores misogynistic views on women amongst the cavemen and a romantic misunderstanding leading to violence and clarification.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen fishing while expressing misogynistic views.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Silence and Misogynistic Retort

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Competition and Flirtation
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss competition for Oola's attention, leading to successful flirtation and jealous reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Surprise Meeting and Talk of Female Attention
Departure and Continued Doubt about Oola

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Clarification
sub_scenes.description: A jealous confrontation turns violent but is resolved by clarifying a romantic misunderstanding.

Major_Arcs.title: Romance Lessons and Infidelity Accusations
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romance lessons given to a muscular caveman and various scenarios involving infidelity accusations and romantic gestures.

sub_scenes.title: Romance Lesson and Rhyming
sub_scenes.description: A smaller caveman teaches a muscular caveman about romance, including rhyming.

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Gestures and Competition
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures like flower and branch giving, leading to competition and a crocodile confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Flashback Anger and Romantic Tension
sub_scenes.description: Flashback anger over stolen Oola, romantic tension and possessiveness.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Loss of Control

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity Accusations and New Romantic Leaf
sub_scenes.description: Infidelity accusations leading to violence, guilt, and attempts to become more romantic.

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous consequences of a dance craze called 'the twitch,' including injuries and pressure to participate.

sub_scenes.title: Twist-Related Injuries and Pressure to Dance
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from 'the twitch' are observed, and Alley is pressured to learn the dance.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Lesson and Mishaps
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts to learn 'the twitch' in a dance lesson, with comical foot-stepping mishaps.

narrative_arcs.title: Ants in the Pants Prank and Humiliation

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel for historical research, leading to unexpected romantic encounters and comedic mishaps.

sub_scenes.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution
sub_scenes.description: Researchers plan to use time travel to study 16th-century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Research Problem and Time Travel Solution

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Encounter in Ancient Spain and Accidental Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Time travel leads to a romantic scene in ancient Spain and an accidental return to the present.

sub_scenes.title: 20th Century Interruption and Return to Ancient Spain
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Oola arrive in the 20th century but are quickly sent back to ancient Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spain Assignment
Justification for Interruption and Thesis Importance
Reassurance and Return to Ancient Spain

Major_Arcs.title: Ancient Spain Bullfight Comedy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a comedic bullfight scenario in ancient Spain, involving a novelty bullfighter and audience reactions.

sub_scenes.title: Return to Ancient Spain and Buster's Serenade
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Oola are back in ancient Spain, and Buster's loud serenade causes a commotion.

narrative_arcs.title: Back in Ancient Spain and Alley's Comment
The Racket and the Dame on the Balcony
The Girlfriend's Fury and Matador's Identity

sub_scenes.title: Novelty Bullfight and Audience Critique
sub_scenes.description: A bullfight proceeds with Buster as a novelty act, drawing critical audience reactions.

narrative_arcs.title: Don Jose's Unconsciousness and the Delayed Bullfight
Desperate Measures and a Novelty Act
Audience Critique of the Novelty Matador

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Entanglements and Unfulfilled Kiss
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around romantic impatience, flirtation, and a recurring unfulfilled kiss scenario.

sub_scenes.title: Impatient Wait and Scientist's Accusation
sub_scenes.description: A woman impatiently waits for information while accusing a scientist of infidelity.

sub_scenes.title: Flirtatious Exchange and Delayed Kiss
sub_scenes.description: A flirtatious exchange and a promised kiss that remains delayed.

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day Misrule
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc satirizes the concept of temporary power and leadership through the 'King for a Day' scenario.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Power Transfer
sub_scenes.description: Introduction to 'King for a Day' concept and the transfer of power to a temporary king.

narrative_arcs.title: Dialogue on the Burden of Kingship
New King's Proclamation and Former King's Command

sub_scenes.title: Mob Rejection and Former King's Manipulation
sub_scenes.description: The crowd rejects the new king, revealing the former king's manipulative plan.

narrative_arcs.title: Mob's Rejection and Former King's Justification
New King's Isolation and Cave Improvement

Major_Arcs.title: Domestic Dispute: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts a domestic dispute between Guz and the Queen, centered around ulcer pills and Guz's dirty feet.

sub_scenes.title: Bon-Bon Misunderstanding and Broom Punishment
sub_scenes.description: Guz enjoys 'bon-bons' which are revealed to be ulcer pills, and he is punished for dirty feet.

narrative_arcs.title: Bon-Bons Revealed as Ulcer Pills and Queen's Disgust

sub_scenes.title: Confusion and Foot Washing Punishment
sub_scenes.description: Guz is confused about the Queen's anger, which is clarified to be about his dirty feet, leading to foot-washing punishment.

narrative_arcs.title: True Cause of Queen's Anger: Filthy Feet

Major_Arcs.title: The Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Solution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a humorous dispute over found clams and the Wise Man's unconventional solution.

sub_scenes.title: Cheating Accusation and Clam Fight
sub_scenes.description: A cheating accusation leads to a physical fight over found clams.

narrative_arcs.title: Fight Over Money and Royal Observation

sub_scenes.title: Wise Man's Intervention and Clam Confiscation
sub_scenes.description: The Wise Man is called to resolve the clam dispute, and he does so by confiscating the clams.

narrative_arcs.title: Summoning the Wise Man for Resolution
Wise Man Consulted on the Argument

Major_Arcs.title: Royal Annoyances and Dinner
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the crowned man dealing with recurring disturbances and finally enjoying his dinosaur dinner, despite health warnings.

sub_scenes.title: Recurring Fight and Money Accusation
sub_scenes.description: Recurring fight outside and a new accusation of money hoarding.

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Dinner and Ulcer Warning
sub_scenes.description: Dinosaur dinner is announced, and the crowned man is warned about his ulcer.

Major_Arcs.title: Ulcer Diet and Sudden Attack
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc contrasts a forced healthy appetizer with a sudden, unexpected violent attack on the crowned man.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Diet and Appetizer
sub_scenes.description: The crowned man is reminded of his ulcer and eats a healthy appetizer.

sub_scenes.title: Peek-a-boo Attack
sub_scenes.description: A playful peek-a-boo prank turns into a violent attack.

Major_Arcs.title: Various Apologies and Strange Scenarios
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc groups together various unrelated scenes involving apologies, ruler proposition, and a strange measurement scenario.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Food Offering
sub_scenes.description: Scenes of apologies and a food offering as amends.

narrative_arcs.title: Pal's Profound Apology and Food Offering

sub_scenes.title: Return to Normalcy and Ruler Proposition
sub_scenes.description: Relief at being a normal citizen again and a ruler proposition.

sub_scenes.title: Board Measurement and Strange Duck
sub_scenes.description: A strange scene involving board measurements and a 'strange duck'.

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Telling and Forced Shaving
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a fortune telling scene leading to a 'barberous act' of forced shaving.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune Telling and Ooola's Wait
sub_scenes.description: Fortune telling about a bearded stranger and Ooola waiting for someone.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shaving Setup and Parlor
sub_scenes.description: Forced shaving is set up with violence and takes place in 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor'.

narrative_arcs.title: Moo Tonsorial Parlor and Forced Shaving

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Experiment Gone Awry
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a scientist's time machine experiment that unexpectedly brings a Roman soldier to the present.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Unexpected Materialization
sub_scenes.description: A scientist sets up a time machine experiment, which leads to the unexpected materialization of a Roman soldier.
